Html:
On the Mage model, one of the later spells is listed as

ABFrB3FrBSc

(arcane blast, frostbolt) x 3 , frostbolt, scorch

The mousover text for the abbreviation says the scorch is needed only depending on haste level to keep the AB buff expiring at the right time.

But the mouseover text for the dps value next to it says

ArcaneBlast - Frostbolt - ArcaneBlast - Frostbolt - ArcaneBlast - Frostbolt - Frostbolt - Frostbolt

I think the last frostbolt in the dps mouseover text needs to be changed to Scorch

OR

I'm reading it wrong?
The mouse over dps shows what is actually used for your specific haste. As the tooltip says the scorch is used only at some very specific breakpoints.
